title: Probability Concept and Reasoning Skill Development Course Using PMRI-Based Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized content delivery for vocational training linked to social sector jobs, designed for environments without PC access.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain basic probability concepts (events, sample space, probability values) based on real-life cases (e.g., culinary tourism) with at least 80% accuracy.
Through inquiry activities following the PMRI approach, learners can systematically organize logical reasoning processes in three or more stages when solving probability problems.
Using microlearning comic content, learners can accurately perform probability calculations for compound events (e.g., unions, conditional probability) with at least 75% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
